name: Donghyuk Kim
title: AI Researcher & Engineer specializing in Generative AI
introduction: With a distinguished career at Samsung Electronics, I have been at the forefront of big data and AI technologies for many years. Since 2022, I have dedicated myself to the cutting-edge field of generative AI, focusing on the creation of innovative AI services and conducting in-depth research. My passion lies in pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence, contributing to the development of transformative solutions that shape the future of technology.

Expertise: Generative AI and Large Language Models
AI Ethics and Responsible AI Development
Professional Highlights: Lead Generative AI at Samsung Electronics AI.Bigdata Lab
Handling petabyte-scale big data collected from televisions
Expertise in Web Applications and Server-Side Development.

Current Focus.description: My current research is centered on advancing generative AI technologies, with a particular emphasis on:
areas: Improving the coherence and factual accuracy of large language models
Developing more efficient training methods for generative models
Exploring the intersection of generative AI and multimodal learning
Investigating ethical implications and safeguards in AI-generated content

quote.text: The future is not something we enter. The future is something we create.
quote.author: Leonard I. Sweet
